sources.title: The Kentuckian (1955) Burt Lancaster Â· Dianne Foster
sources.description: The story of a peaceful man who emigrates with his son from densely populated Kentucky (circa 1820) to undeveloped Texas. A trapper romance in the style of the Wild West that offers relaxing family entertainment. Burt Lancaster ' s debut as a director.

metadata.Plot: A delicious love story centered around a single father attempting raise his son despite the temptations of liquor and women. Lancaster shines as the stable and regal frontiersman fending off the seductions of Walter Matthau and lewd desires.
metadata.Actors: Burt Lancaster, Diana Lynn, Dianne Foster
